Global Reach

Enabling Hardware

Say  to our card readers

Accepting credit and debit card payments has never been so easy. Our unique EMV pre-certified terminals adapt to your needs whether you'd prefer a fixed point of sale station or a mobile device, whether you're in a store or on the street. Wherever there's access to the internet, you can accept card payments. Magstripe, contactless, and chip cards are supported as well as Apple Pay and Android Pay.

AND

Enabling Software

Control the checkout experience

Handpoint's APIs offer quick integration and an easy route to market for companies wanting to add card payment capabilites to their mobile point of sale (mPOS) solutions. Our software development kit (SDK), available on three platforms, iOS, Android and Windows, grants POS developers full control over the card reader so they can deliver a seamless and integrated experience to their merchants.

Strive for growth by partnering with Handpoint

Retailers and Merchants

With its extended network of partners, Handpoint offers you a fully-fledged mobile payments solution catered to your needs. From PC and tablet point of sale systems to a simple mobile phone app for smaller, less frequent merchant transactions, we adapt our offer to your business.

Point of Sale Developers

As a developer you are probably looking for an easy and integrated way to accept card payments. That is why Handpoint offers you simple, yet powerful, development kits to integrate with our card readers. We take care of the payment logic so you can get started even sooner.

Resellers and Dealers

If you're interested in reselling Handpoint's integrated payment solution, we would love to explore opportunities and work with you. We offer support, documentation, white labeling and rebranding of our card readers so that you can personalize the solution to better suit your needs.

Global Reach: Process Payments Around the Globe
